name: git-versioning
description: Shell hooks and util for GIT versioning
author: B. van Berkum

scripts.src-loc: cat .gitignore | sed -e 's/\(.*\)/-not -path "*\1*" /' | xargs find ./ -type f -not -path '*/.git/*' -not -path '*.log' | xargs cat | grep -v '^\s*$' | wc -l | awk '{print $1}'
scripts.dep-local: echo node_modules/* | xargs basename | sort -u | awk '{print $1}'
scripts.dep-local-all: find node_modules/ -iname node_modules | xargs /bin/ls -w1 | grep -v '^$' | grep -v 'node_modules' | sort -u | awk '{print $1}'
